products.title: HVDC Circuit Breaker
products.description: The new high voltage DC circuit breaker is a kind of product based on the“Artificial intelligence zero crossing”converter technology. The new product perfectly solves the technical defects of the traditional high voltage DC circuit breaker, such as slow operating speed, long arc extinguishing time and so on.

features.title: Power system reliability
features.text: Through the“mechanical DC circuit breaker” technology, the abnormal power branch system is quickly disconnected.

features.title: Smart features
features.text: Product integration intelligent monitoring and automatic control functions, improve the level of intelligence of the system, can be real-time on-line monitoring.

features.title: Miniaturization
features.text: The design is more compact, takes up less space, and is conducive to system integration and layout requirements.

features.title: Smart operation
features.text: Intelligent diagnosis component state, the implementation is bad recovery.

products.title: High-Voltage Substation with E-house
products.description: Prefabricated modular substations have outstanding advantages such as fast construction, small footprint, low investment, and flexible layout, and are widely used in the construction of substations in various fields such as new energy, petroleum, coal, industrial users, and urban centers.

features.title: Product technical solution
features.text: 1. The core of a substation is its equipment, and Siyuan has the research and production capabilities for a full range of primary and secondary power equipment in substations. 2. The typical layout scheme of the E-house covers 10~330kV substations, and the E-house has independent and customized design capabilities. Through rational design of structural strength, anti-corrosion, insulation, HVAC, dust and waterproof, it meets various substation operating conditions and has the most complete test report on the market. 3. Fifteen years of experience in domestic and international substation EPC projects, able to provide turnkey projects for customers

features.title: Reduce costs, increase efficiency, and create value
features.text: 1. Large scale production with good efficiency and high quality at the same price, creating maximum value for customers. 2. Strong overall optimization design capabilities, providing optimal system solutions, and reducing the comprehensive cost of substations through site layout, equipment selection recommendations, and other aspects.

products.title: Mobile High-Voltage Substation
products.description: Mobile High-Voltage Substations are a flexible and efficient power solution designed for rapid deployment and temporary power supply. They integrate transformers, switching equipment, and protective devices, capable of operating in various environments and suitable for emergency power, construction sites, events, and temporary facilities. Their modular design facilitates transportation and installation, ensuring a quick response to changes in power demand.

features.title: Quick Launch and Benefit Protection
features.text: By leasing mobile substation equipment, the factory can operate quickly with load to ensure customer benefits

features.title: Capacity Enhancement and Stability Improvement of Power Systems
features.text: The original substation's main transformer is expanded to increase capacity, and load transfer is provided through the lease of mobile substations to provide more stable power guarantees

features.title: Compact layout and flexible transportation
features.text: Compact structure, small volume, easy to transport, occupies less land, and is very mobile for investment and withdrawal

specifications.110/10kV Mobile High Voltage Substation:
Main transformer capacity：40 MVA
10kV outgoing line side：6 Return circuit 400-800 A
vehicle configuration：Power transformer&HGIS trailer+E-house trailer
Size（L*W*H mm）：
Power transformer&HGIS trailer：20000*3000*4500
E-house trailer：13000*2500*4450
specifications.35/10kV Mobile High Voltage Substation f: Main transformer capacity：20 MVA. 10kV outgoing line side：6 Return circuit 400-800 A. Vehicle configuration：Power transformer&HGIS trailer+E-house trailer. Size（L*W*H mm）：. Power transformer&HGIS trailer：13000*3000*4500. E-house trailer：12500*2500*4450
specifications.110kV Skid Mounted High Voltage Substati: Main transformer capacity：50 MVA. 10kV outgoing line side：7 Return circuit 400-800 A. Configuration：High voltage substation module+Power Distribution Module. Size（L*W*H mm）：. High voltage substation moduler：14540*3200*8380. Power Distribution Module：15500*10040*3100
specifications.35kV Skid Mounted High Voltage Substatio: Main transformer capacity：20 MVA. 10kV outgoing line side：7 Return circuit 400-800 A. Configuration：Integration of power transformation and distribution. Size（L*W*H mm）：12500*9000*3500

products.title: Oil Immersed Insulated Power Transformer
products.description: Sieyuan Toshiba's Oil-Immersed Power Transformer is designed and manufactured with Toshiba's core technology, covering voltage ratings up to 750kV. It features low losses, low noise, minimal partial discharge, and high short-circuit impedance, making it suitable for diverse installation environments and demanding operating conditions.

features.title: Highly Reliable Design
features.text: Incorporating Toshiba Japan technology with stringent quality control throughout the entire process to ensure long-term stable operation.

features.title: Superior Performance
features.text: Features low loss, low noise, low partial discharge, and high short-circuit resistance

features.title: Customized Solutions
features.text: Professional tailored solutions to meet diverse environmental and operational

products.title: Gas Insulated Power Transformer
products.description: Gas-insulated transformers utilize inert gas as the insulating medium, featuring compact structure, fireproof and explosion-proof characteristics, making them particularly suitable for space-constrained installations like urban substations. These transformers offer high reliability, near-maintenance-free operation, and excellent environmental adaptability.
bullets: Extended service life and hassle-free maintenance

features.title: Reliable quality and outstanding performance
features.text: Our products deliver reliable quality and outstanding performance. Manufactured with industry-leading specialized production and testing equipment in dedicated dust-proof, moisture-resistant, and temperature-controlled GIS transformer workshops. Standard models comply with GB 20052-2024 Class II energy efficiency requirements, while custom-designed models meeting Class I energy efficiency standards are available upon request.

features.title: Explosion-proof and non-flammable
features.text: DUtilizing inert gas as insulation medium, it demonstrates minimal tank pressure increase during internal faults compared to conventional oil-immersed transformers, completely eliminating tank rupture risks and ensuring absolute safety for substation equipment, achieving true explosion-proof and fire-proof performance.

features.title: Space saving and high reliability
features.text: With customizable R&D solutions, it flexibly adapts to diverse application scenarios. The integrated structural design significantly reduces overall substation costs, while offering flexible main transformer room layout, easy installation, and maintenance-free operation.

features.title: Extended service life and hassle-free maintenance
features.text: By positioning the cooler air pumps in the lower low-temperature zone, it effectively slows lubricant and gear aging, extending pump service life by over 30%. The innovative
design enables safer and more convenient maintenance, reducing user maintenance frequency by 50% while significantly improving operational efficiency.

products.title: High Voltage Shunt Reactor
products.description: Sieyuan Toshiba's High-Voltage Shunt Reactor features low noise, high reliability, and safe operation. It effectively neutralizes the capacitive effect of EHV long-distance transmission lines, absorbs excess reactive power, and improves power transmission efficiency. Additionally, It suppresses harmonic currents in the power system, enhancing power quality for end-users.

features.title: Low loss, low noise, and high reliability
features.text: The shunt reactor adopts a radial iron disc structure with high core fill factor, uniform magnetic flux distribution, negligible leakage flux, and low no-load loss. The iron discs are separated by special non-magnetic spacers (e.g., marble), and the entire assembly is vacuum-impregnated with epoxy resin, ensuring minimal vibration and ultra-low operational noise.

products.title: 145kV Gas Insulated Switchgear
products.description: ZF28A-145 Gas Insulated Switchgear is a three-phase AC high-voltage electrical equipment, which is designed for controlling, measuring, protecting, and switching power transmission lines, and can be combined into the required main wiring arrangement according to user requirements.

features.title: Compact structure
features.text: It features a three-phase common enclosure design, allowing for flexible and convenient engineering arrangement.

features.title: High reliability
features.text: It adopts a double-channel sealing structure, ensuring an annual gas leakage rate of less than 0.1%. With excellent insulation performance, it exhibits a whole bay partial discharge of less than 3pC. It also features a three-station isolation earthing switch structure, which includes mechanical interlock between the isolation and earthing mechanisms for effectively avoiding misoperation.

features.title: High safety
features.text: With busbars and outgoing lines arranged on both sides of the circuit breaker, and inspection and maintenance accesses provided on both sides of the bay, it eliminates the need to enter the bay for routing inspection.

features.title: High modularity
features.text: The product boasts a highly modular design. The connecting flanges are of standardized dimensions, allowing for flexible configuration according to requirements, and the modules are highly interchangeable, facilitating expansion and the optimization of substation layout.

products.title: 252/550kV Gas-Insulated Transmission Line
products.description: GXL 28-252/550 Gas-insulated Transmission Line is a transmission line with high voltage level, large transmission capacity and high safety and reliability. It features a safer, more efficient, green and intelligent transmission mode than cable and overhead line.

features.title: Excellent performance
features.text: It boasts a particularly high transmission capacity, with a maximum current of up to 8000A, and exhibits minimal thermal and electrical energy losses, resulting in good energy-saving effect.

features.title: High safety
features.text: It has good protection performance, and is characterized by less maintenance work and an extremely low failure rate. It shows strong resistance against disasters such as ice, snow, and earthquakes, and offers excellent fire protection performance, ensuring high safety and reliability

features.title: Good usability
features.text: It is easy to maintain and inspect, and has a long service life. It covers a small space, supports a wide voltage range, and can be installed in various ways.

products.title: ZHW58A Hybrid Gas Insulated Switchgear
products.description: ZHW58A combined apparatus integrates modules such as circuit breaker, DS, ES, CT, PT, FES, etc. It features a small footprint, strong environmental adaptability, high reliability, and maintenance-free operation. The rated voltage covers 40.5-145kV, making it suitable for high-voltage power transmission and distribution applications such as substations.

features.title: Compact structure
features.text: Three-phase split-tank design with an integrated base frame. Enables integral three-phase transportation by bay, ensuring convenient and reliable on-site installation.

features.title: Excellent electrical performance
features.text: Superior insulation properties. Integral partial discharge <3pC. Horizontal breaker layout structure enables switching capability of 40kA.

features.title: UReliable mechanical performance
features.text: Employs a new integrated die-cast aluminum base spring operating mechanism. Compact structural design with stable output performance ensures high reliability and maintenance-free operation. Mechanical life meets M2 class requirements.

features.title: Highly modular design
features.text: Modular design approach. Standardized connection flange dimensions enable flexible configuration according to requirements. Strong module interchangeability facilitates functional expansion to optimize substation layout.
